TopicTitle: I need help updating my KSP

Articles.Content: I am looking everywhere for the new KSP upgrade. Please send me a clear precise link to get it thanks.

.22 is not out yet.

.21 can be downloaded from the store once you've bought it.

https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/index.php

If you have the steam version it will automatically update once an update is available.

OK no .22 but in the store I am not seeing any download link.

What am I missing?

in the store click on account.

on your account page there should be a link. I can't tell exactly what it says as mine looks different because I transferred to steam.
